description: An API server instance reports the version it can decode and the version it encodes objects to when persisting objects in the backend.

apiServerID.description: The ID of the reporting API server.

decodableVersions.description: The API server can decode objects encoded in these versions. The encodingVersion must be included in the decodableVersions.

encodingVersion.description: The API server encodes the object to this version when persisting it in the backend (e.g., etcd).
